note.p: Career: Assistant Director, Research Institute of Plant Physiology, Imperial College of Science
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1963 vol 9 pp 131-153, plate, by Helen K Porter and F J Richards
Notes: The entry in BR is blank apart from the name, which is given as 'Fritz Gugenheim Gregory'; in the supplement to R, however, his first name is as above, Frederick.
